WINNITRON

An open source platform for indie arcade machines and games.

  • Get the Launcher
  • Upload a Game
Learn More

Build your own indie arcade machine
and let the Winnitron manage your games.

The Winnitron Launcher displays and runs your arcade game library
while the Winnitron Network lets you manage it from your browser.

  • Lorem
  • Ipsum
  • Dolor

Manage Your Games
with ease

It's easy to manage your games on the Winnitron whether you just slap a couple games in a folder, or use the Network sync your games.

Upload your game to
machines around the world

Using the Winnitron Network, you can manage your Winnitron from home, or upload your projects for Winnitrons everywhere.

A great way to display
your community's projects

Arcade machines are great for showcasing the work your community has put in. Even great for showing off your jam games.

Get Involved

Build your own indie arcade machine or help us expand our games library.
